# Travel Time

## Set up

```{r}
## Load packages
library(dplyr)
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(gdistance)
library(velox)
library(osmdata)

## Define projection
UTM_PROJ_EPSG <- 3968
```

## Create example points
Create example points to calculate travel time between

```{r}
locs_sp <- bind_rows(
  data.frame(name = "national cathedral",
             lat = 38.930589,
             lon = -77.070803),
  
  data.frame(name = "capitol",
             lat = 38.889867,
             lon = -77.009064),
  
  data.frame(name = "world bank",
             lat = 38.898987,
             lon = -77.042402),
  
  data.frame(name = "takoma metro",
             lat = 38.975616,
             lon = -77.017906)
)

## Add unique ID
locs_sp$id <- 1:nrow(locs_sp)

## Spatially define
coordinates(locs_sp) <- ~lon+lat
crs(locs_sp) <- CRS("+init=epsg:4326")

## Project
locs_sp <- spTransform(locs_sp, CRS(paste0("+init=epsg:", UTM_PROJ_EPSG)))
```
